menu.name: Useless Additions
menu.desc: Useless Addition Addon! could be something you like is here!

menu.name: Gameplay Modifiers
menu.desc: Gameplay Modifiers like Playback rate and other!

number.name: Playback Rate
number.desc: Change how fast you want the song to be! (Note, If a song has split vocals, It cannot pitch the vocals.)

choice.name: HUD Type
choice.desc: What kind of hud would you like?

checkbox.name: Middle Scroll
checkbox.desc: Tired of looking right (or left) for your arrows? Fear no more, have your arrows in the middle!

checkbox.name: Show Opponent Arrows
checkbox.desc: Want to hide your opponent arrows? Uncheck this option!
